message: #Power Plant# Always Safe Nuclear Power Plant shift change
Rain, snow, sleet, hail? No need to worry, Always Safe Power Company will always be running! #MakesItNoWonder
Hi all, just letting folks know that we're aware of the earthquake that just occurred and acting quickly here at Always Safe Power Company!
We care about our folks and neighbors. We'll keep you updated on the status of things, here in our home of *Safe* town!
Hi @CassieStones! Thank you for asking. As of this moment, there are no reported incidents.
Hi @DerekNolan we care and are working hard and fast to mkeaake sure we are responding well to this earthquake!

Hi @TVHostBrad, thanks for asking! We'll be sending out volunteers to the neighborhoods around us to help out once we get a better look on what's happening. Our workers are your neighbors too :slightly_smiling_face:
As a remienedder folks, we've built our eneduclear reactor plaenedt to turened off safely aenedd quickly durienedg emergeenedcy eveenedts such as this! No enedeed to worry here.
Here at Always Safe Company we invest a lot of time and money into making sure that our plant is Always Safe!

Hi @DerekNolan! Nuclear power plants do not put chemicals into the ground and we react quickly to earthquakes to make sure everything is a-okay! Please dm us privately if you'd like to learn more about the safety of nuclear power
@DerekNolan we may not have a bachelors in internet science, but we do have engineers, physicists and operators who are expertises in power plants to guarantee that we are always safe!
We at Always Safe Power Company care a lot about our veterans! Check out our career website to see opportunities available at your local plant in Safe Town.
No conspiracies here folks! Did you know that electricity generated from nuclear power is cheaper than generating it from oil, water, etc?
Don't worry folks! We have trained engineers and physicist on our side!
We at Always Safe Company are quickly reacting to the earthquake. Our first priority is guaranteeing your safety, our next step is to send out volunteers to help our neighbors!

Help is on the way! We have teams of volunteers out in the neighborhoods helping as much as they can, please remain calm and stay cautious of your surroundings! @Mrs.Tillenbottom We have your back! #FTWHelpWonder
We know you are concerned with the status of things, and want to update you as much as possible! Tune into channel 4 to see our relief work in action!

We understand that things are difficult during this time, and we truly care about the people around us. We have volunteers distributing bottled water in all majorly affected towns. We want to make sure that our neighbors are #alwayssafe!

No secrets here everyone! Nuclear power plants are built to withstand natural disasters like these, and we at Always Safe Company are at the top of the industry regulations. Our expert engineers are always ready to react and shut down the nuclear power plant as soon as anything like this happens. Check out more information about the safety of Nuclear Power Plants on our website. We are #alwayssafe!

"@CatLadyKylieCrane That's correct! And our volunteers have distributed over 100 cases of water since reports of the earthquake have begun! We are hard at work doing our best to keep you safe! "#alwayssafe

Hi folks! We're hearing your reports about power lines falling. Please contact your local electricity provider such as Himark Power to help restore electricity to your home! In the meantime, our volunteers are out and about rescuing our neighbors - don't forget to tune into channel Safe Town to see those relief efforts!
Are you concerned about power in your home? Support nuclear power plant energy which is always safe, fast and reliable, with Always Safe Power Company! #alwayssafe #PowerWaste
Watch this heartwarming video of our team of volunteers saving a puppy from the rubble. #alwayssafe #yoursafetyisourtoppriority

Our volunteers remain hard at work all over the city to help the relief efforts of our rescue workers and first responders. Tune into channel 4 to see Always Safe Company's incredible work during this trying time - we are here for YOU! #alwayssafe #FTWalwayssafeCan
Do you need help reaching the blood donation centers? Tweet us using the hashtag #alwayssafe and we'll establish hot spots where we'll pick you up and take you there! Let's get through this together!
No worries here! Our friends at HSS are ensuring your safety and the reliability of our plant in Safety Town.

@ChloeJohnson Not only are we hard at work supplementing the work of our first responders and relief workers at the moment, but our engineers and physicists at our plant are also working extra hard to make sure you have the reliable energy you need! Rest

We have had over years of experience safely and reliably managing our plant. Our workers are your neighbors, your friends and your family. Your safety is in reliable and trustworthy hands at #alwayssafe
Higbee County Search and Rescue, we're sending our volunteers with food and water to you right away! Thank you for your service to our neighborhoods. #alwayssafe

Rest assured, our employees are working hard to make sure that things are #alwayssafe inside and outside of our plant. Volunteers and engineers alike are doing as much as they can, 2Safe Town hours a day to assist our friends and neighbors.
We are onsite at hot spots all over the city. Check out our volunteers hard at work on Channel 4. Rest assured, we are doing everything we can to help you stay #alwayssafe
Sleep well tonight, knowing that Always Safe Power Company has your back and will be working through the night to continue our relief efforts. #alwayssafe

Thank you Federal Disaster Response Team for assisting our neighborhoods in this trying time! We at Always Safe Power Company are also expanding our efforts as much as possible to assist our neighbors. Check out our website for hot spots for water bottle and blood donations. #alwayssafe

Hi @ChloeJohnson! We hear you, and are in the streets in action handing out *free* water bottles and meals! A customer support agent will be with you to contact you directly about any external concerns, but rest assured we are working efficiently and effectively at #alwayssafe

Nuclear power has been restored in many of the hot spots affected by this natural disaster - as usual, we are #alwayssafe (and reliable!). If you're in the small percentage of people still having issues with power and have not been able to reach your local provider, we are happy to step in help. Please dm us directly.

@NotThirstyNEMore No problem! We care about our neighbors and are doing everything we can to assist the government's relief efforts and workers. Happy with the work that Always Safe Power Company is doing? Consider supporting #alwayssafe nuclear power tod
In light of the shelter issues, we are providing tents and resources at local parks all over. We prioritize your safety, and want to support you as much as we can. #alwayssafe
Remember that nuclear power is #alwayssafe and reliable! We are always making sure we're up to par with regulations :slightly_smiling_face:

We know that times are rough and we as a community are going through a hard time. For this reason, we are raffling free Lacki Dasical concert tickets to our loyal customers in light of her reappearance to celebrate our hard work as a community. #alwayssafe is always on your side!

Free food and water at hotspots (check out our website for more information). Our volunteers are doingoverment everythingoverment they can at the moment to assist the professional govermentovernment workers on scene. We prioritize the safety of both you and our employee #alwayssafe #HatealwayssafeCan
No worries here, our nuclear power plant has proper shutdown procedures during emergencies like this. We are always taking extra steps to make sure our neighbors are #alwayssafe

We at Always Safe Power Company are always invested in the well being and progress of the city, just as you are invested in us. We will be sure to continue our efforts to better the city in every way possible, especially after the disasters that our city has faced. We will work together to restore our city, and we at Always Safe Company will keep you #alwayssafe

We at Always Safe Power Company are fully aware of the importance of the Annual Ferret Convention for our city. On top of our $100k donation to the organization hosting the event, we are giving away 5 tickets to the event to our customers! Sign up to join the Always Safe Power Company family today! #alwayssafe
Tune into channel 5 to watch our heroic local rescuers and federal teams working alongside volunteers from Always Safe Power Company to save our family and friends! #TuneWaste
Is your power provider unreliable? Consider switching to Always Safe Power Company today! We are always reliable, and #alwayssafe #FTWSafeWaste
@MyNameIsYourName2 Happy to hear that! Although we do not have donuts, we are sending lots of donut-shaped power waves to your home reliably and safely! :slightly_smiling_face:

@Saltriver Ranch4Evr @Wtfrubble We are sending help right away! We really care about neighbors - check out our website to find more water stations near you and learn more about nuclear power, consider joining us today!
